year.title: Year
year.description: The tax year to which the calculation relates. Must be tax year 2016-17 or later.

intentToCrystallise.title: Intent To Crystallise
intentToCrystallise.description: Shows if this calculation is provided with the intent to crystallise.

crystallised.title: Crystallised
crystallised.description: Shows if the calculation has been performed on the crystallised position.

validationMessageCount.title: Validation Message Count
validationMessageCount.description: The quantity of validation messages encountered during the calculation.

incomeTaxAndNicYTD.title: Income Tax And Nic YTD
incomeTaxAndNicYTD.description: The Income Tax and National Insurance contributions due, based on year-to-date figures. The value must be between -99999999999999.98 and 99999999999999.98.

nationalRegime.title: National Regime
nationalRegime.description: Defines which national tax rates and rules to apply to the calculation. Must be one of: UK, Scotland

totalIncome.title: Total Income
totalIncome.description: The total income from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalPay.title: Total Pay
totalPay.description: The total net pay from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalBenefitsAndExpenses.title: Total Benefits And Expenses
totalBenefitsAndExpenses.description: The total benefits and expenses from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalAllowableExpenses.title: Total Allowable Expenses
totalAllowableExpenses.description: The total allowable expenses from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

netPay.title: Net Pay
netPay.description: The year-to-date net pay for this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

benefitsAndExpenses.title: Benefits And Expenses
benefitsAndExpenses.description: The benefits and expenses relating to this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

allowableExpenses.title: Allowable Expenses
allowableExpenses.default: The allowable expenses relating to this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalIncome.title: Total Income
totalIncome.description: The total income from all self-employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

selfEmploymentId.title: Self-Employment ID
selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The taxable income from this self-employment business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether this self-employment income has been finalised.

losses.title: Losses
losses.description: Any loss from this self-employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalIncome.title: Total Income
totalIncome.description: The total income from all UK property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsTaxableProfit.title: Non-Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Profit
nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsTaxableProfit.description: Taxable profit from UK non-furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.title: Non-Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Loss
nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.description: Loss from UK non-furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

furnishedHolidayLettingsTaxableProfit.title: Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Profit
furnishedHolidayLettingsTaxableProfit.description: Taxable profit from UK furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

furnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.title: Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Loss
furnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.description: Loss from UK furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the self-employment income has been finalised.

totalIncome.title: Total Income
totalIncome.description: The total income from all UK dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalIncomeReceived.title: Total Income Received
totalIncomeReceived.description: The total income received for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalAllowancesAndDeductions.title: Total Allowances And Deductions
totalAllowancesAndDeductions.description: The total of all allowances and deductions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity.title: Gift Of Investments And Property To Charity
giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity.description: Investments and/or property gifts made to charity. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

apportionedPersonalAllowance.title: Apportioned Personal Allowance
apportionedPersonalAllowance.description: The amount of the annual personal allowance that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalTaxableIncome.title: Total Taxable Income
totalTaxableIncome.description: The total taxable income (income less allowances and deductions). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The total income subject to Income Tax calculation. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalAmount.title: Total Amount
totalAmount.description: The total amount of income tax associated with pay and pensions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of: ART, BRT, HRT, SRT, ZRT

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold
apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

income.title: Income
income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

personalAllowanceUsed.title: Personal Allowance Used
personalAllowanceUsed.description: The amount of the apportioned annual personal allowance that has been offset against pay and pensions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The taxable income associated with pay and pensions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalAmount.title: Total Amount
totalAmount.description: The total amount of Income Tax associated with savings and gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of: ART, BRT, HRT, SRT, ZRT

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold
apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

income.title: Income
income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

personalAllowanceUsed.title: Personal Allowance Used
personalAllowanceUsed.description: The amount of the apportioned annual personal allowance that has been offset against savings and gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The taxable income associated with savings and gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalAmount.title: Total Amount
totalAmount.description: The total amount of Income Tax associated with dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of: ART, BRT, HRT, SRT, ZRT

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold
apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

income.title: Income
income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

personalAllowanceUsed.title: Personal Allowance Used
personalAllowanceUsed.description: The amount of the apportioned annual personal allowance that has been offset against dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The taxable income associated with dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalBeforeReliefs.title: Total Before Reliefs
totalBeforeReliefs.description: The total Income Tax before allowances and reliefs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

propertyFinanceRelief.title: Property Finance Relief
propertyFinanceRelief.description: The relief against property finance costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalAllowancesAndReliefs.title: Total Allowances And Reliefs
totalAllowancesAndReliefs.description: The total amount of allowances and reliefs. The value must be between -99999999999999.98 and 99999999999999.98.

totalAfterReliefs.title: Total After Reliefs
totalAfterReliefs.description: The total Income Tax after allowances and reliefs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

paymentsMade.title: Payments Made
paymentsMade.description: The total amount of Gift Aid payments made for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The basic rate of tax that applies to Gift Aid. The value must be between 0 and 99.99.

taxableAmount.title: Taxable Amount
taxableAmount.description: The taxable amount of the Gift Aid payments made. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalAfterGiftAid.title: Total After Gift Aid
totalAfterGiftAid.description: The total Income Tax after Gift Aid. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalIncomeTax.title: Total Income Tax
totalIncomeTax.description: The total calculated Income Tax after allowances and reliefs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalNic.title: Total NIC
totalNic.description: The calculated amount of National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The calculated amount of Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

weekRate.title: Week Rate
weekRate.description: The weekly rate for Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

weeks.title: Weeks
weeks.description: The number of weeks applied to the calculation.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The annual limit of Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

apportionedLimit.title: Apportioned Limit
apportionedLimit.description: The apportioned amount of annual Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

totalAmount.title: Total Amount
totalAmount.description: The calculated amount of Class 4 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of: BRT, HRT, ZRT

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold
apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

income.title: Income
income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalBeforeTaxDeducted.title: Total Before Tax Deducted
totalBeforeTaxDeducted.description: The subtotal of Income Tax and National Insurance before tax is deducted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

ukLandAndProperty.title: UK Land And Property
ukLandAndProperty.description: Tax that has been deducted for UK land and property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalTaxDeducted.title: Total Tax Deducted
totalTaxDeducted.description: The total amount of Income Tax and National Insurance that has been deducted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

supplied.title: Supplied
supplied.description: Shows whether the employment income has been supplied or calculated. If true, the employment income has been supplied. If false, the employment income has been calculated.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the employment income has been finalised.

selfEmploymentId.title: Self-Employment ID
selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from this self-employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

supplied.title: Supplied
supplied.description: Shows whether this self-employment income has been supplied or calculated. If true, the self-employment income has been supplied. If false, the self-employment income has been calculated.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether this self-employment income has been finalised.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from UK property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

supplied.title: Supplied
supplied.description: Shows whether the UK property income has been supplied or calculated. If true, UK property income has been supplied. If false, the UK property income has been calculated.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the UK property income has been finalised.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from UK dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

supplied.title: Supplied
supplied.description: Shows whether the UK dividend income has been supplied or calculated. If true, UK dividend income has been supplied. If false, the UK dividend income has been calculated.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the UK dividend income has been finalised.

totalTaxableIncome.title: Total Taxable Income
totalTaxableIncome.description: The total estimated taxable income from all income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

incomeTaxAmount.title: Income Tax Amount
incomeTaxAmount.description: The estimated amount of Income Tax. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

nic2.title: NIC 2
nic2.description: The estimated amount of Class 2 National Insurance contributions, net of deductions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

nic4.title: NIC 4
nic4.description: The estimated amount of Class 4 National Insurance contributions, net of deductions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

totalNicAmount.title: Total NIC Amount
totalNicAmount.description: The total estimated amount of National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

incomeTaxAndNicAmount.title: Income Tax And NIC Amount
incomeTaxAndNicAmount.description: The total estimated amount of Income Tax and National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.

calculationMessageCount.title: Calculation Message Count
calculationMessageCount.description: The quantity of warning/information messages for the calculation.

type.title: Type
type.description: The message type. Must be one of: warning information

personalAllowance.title: Personal Allowance
personalAllowance.description: The annual amount of personal allowance available for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

personalAllowanceThreshold.title: Personal Allowance Threshold
personalAllowanceThreshold.description: The threshold at which the annual personal allowance is reduced. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

reducedPersonalAllowance.title: Reduced Personal Allowance
reducedPersonalAllowance.description: The annual amount that the personal allowance is reduced to, if the income exceeds the personalAllowanceThreshold amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.

giftAidExtender.title: Gift Aid Extender
giftAidExtender.description: The amount by which the rate band thresholds are extended as a result of Gift Aid claimed against this tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999999.98.
